CoPilot

Code completion within RStudio
Write a comment, coPilot writes the code
Context aware - uses the packages you have loaded

Can make coding faster (but code can be bad!)

title: Copilot and Quarto
text:
Setting up CoPilot

Make a github account on github.com
Sign up for Copilot (free with an an educational license github.com/education)
In RStudio, go to Tools -> Global Options -> Copilot -> Enable copilot
Press tab to accept CoPilot suggestions
Use ctrl+space to see RStudio autocomplete suggestions
